channel.title: Fish on Tender Meat Love
channel.description: Recent content in Fish on Tender Meat Love

item.title: Broiled Tilapia w/ Mustard Chive Sauce
item.description: Pre-heat broiler and line a cooking tray with foil Pat fish dry and then brush fish with S&P and olive oil Cook 4-8 minutes (depends on stove) Mix everything else together for the sauce, drizzle over fish before serving
